Hierarch Kekropus:
Anyways, you've done a great job.
I think that your failure to gain control of the ship was because Ramona is able to endlessly resurrect using the power of the Shine Stone.
However, there will come a day when Ramona is defeated, and never gets up again. Until that day comes, we'd like you to come and lend us your powers when we need to go after Ramona.
